info.name: Time Bank
info.description:
A time banking application that enables community members to exchange services using hours as currency. Features include:
- **Request Board**: Post and browse community service requests - **Skill Matching**: Find volunteers based on experience and completed work - **Earning Claims**: Submit hours worked with optional evidence - **Admin Approval**: Workflow for verifying earning claims - **External Voting**: Democratic oversight by community auditors - **Public Ledger**: Transparent record of all transactions - **Category Multipliers**: Different earn rates for specialized skills
info.author: Community Time Bank
